description.zh-cn: 中国“文化大革命”期间发生的一系列针对各级党政机关的夺权事件，由各地群众造反组织发起，以建立“革命委员会”取代原有党政机关。
description.en: A series of power seizure events targeting party and government organs at all levels during China's Cultural Revolution, initiated by local rebel organizations, which replaced the original party and government bodies with 'Revolutionary Committees'.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通常简称为中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上的一场政治运动，由毛泽东发动和领导。
description.en: A political movement in the history of the People's Republic of China, launched and led by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间响应号召，对当权的各级党政机关进行夺权的群众组织。
description.en: Mass organizations that, in response to calls during the Cultural Revolution, seized power from party and government organs at various levels.

description.zh-cn: 1967年1月在上海发生的夺权事件，被认为是“夺权运动”的开端。
description.en: A power seizure event that took place in Shanghai in January 1967, considered the beginning of the 'Seizure of Power' movement.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命“夺权运动”中建立的临时权力机构，集党、政大权于一身，取代了原有的党委和政府。
description.en: Provisional organs of power established during the 'Seizure of Power' movement of the Cultural Revolution, which concentrated all party and government power and replaced the original party committees and governments.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，文化大革命期间曾任黑龙江省革命委员会主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Director of the Heilongjiang Provincial Revolutionary Committee during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间在黑龙江省成立的省级权力机构。
description.en: The provincial organ of power established in Heilongjiang Province during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的直辖市。
description.en: A municipality directly under the Central Government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导下的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The highest military command and control institution under the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间取代了中共中央政治局和中央书记处的机构，成为实际上的最高权力机构。
description.en: An organization that replaced the Politburo and the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee during the Cultural Revolution, becoming the de facto supreme authority.

nodes.id: 关于人民解放军坚决支持革命左派群众的决定

zh-cn: 关于人民解放军坚决支持革命左派群众的决定

description.zh-cn: 1967年1月由中共中央、国务院、中央军委、中央文革小组联合发出的文件，要求军队支持“革命左派”，标志着军队正式介入地方文革。
description.en: A document jointly issued in January 1967 by the CPC Central Committee, the State Council, the Central Military Commission, and the Cultural Revolution Group, which ordered the army to support the 'revolutionary leftists', marking the formal intervention of the military in the local Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要武装力量。
description.en: The principal military force of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，军队执行的“支左、支工、支农、军管、军训”任务的简称。
description.en: An abbreviation for the tasks undertaken by the military during the Cultural Revolution: 'support the left, support industry, support agriculture, military control, and military training'.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，不同派别的群众组织之间发生的暴力冲突。
description.en: Violent conflicts between different factions of mass organizations during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命时期以林彪为首的政治军事集团。
description.en: A political-military faction headed by Lin Biao during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的自治区。
description.en: An autonomous region of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的自治区。
description.en: An autonomous region of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 夺权运动是文化大革命期间发生的一系列事件。
description.en: The Seizure of Power movement was a series of events that occurred during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 夺权运动主要由各地的造反派发起。
description.en: The Seizure of Power movement was mainly initiated by rebel factions in various localities.

description.zh-cn: 上海“一月风暴”的爆发，标志着夺权运动在全国范围内大规模展开。
description.en: The outbreak of the 'January Storm' in Shanghai marked the beginning of the nationwide expansion of the Seizure of Power movement.

description.zh-cn: 在夺权运动过程中，各地建立了“革命委员会”以代替原先的党政机关。
description.en: During the Seizure of Power movement, 'Revolutionary Committees' were established in various places to replace the original party and government organs.

description.zh-cn: 夺权运动引起的震荡和权力争夺导致大规模“武斗”频发。
description.en: The upheaval and power struggles caused by the Seizure of Power movement led to frequent large-scale violent clashes.

description.zh-cn: 夺权斗争给社会各方面带来严重损失，据官方数据，社会总产值1967年比上年下降9.9%、1968年比上年再降4.7%。
description.en: The power seizure struggles brought severe losses to all aspects of society. According to official data, the gross social product decreased by 9.9% in 1967 compared to the previous year, and by another 4.7% in 1968.

description.zh-cn: 夺权运动为林彪集团提供了乘机膨胀、攫取部分党政大权的机会。
description.en: The Seizure of Power movement provided the Lin Biao Clique with an opportunity to expand its influence and seize a portion of party and government power.

description.zh-cn: 夺权运动为中央文革小组提供了乘机膨胀、攫取部分党政大权的机会。
description.en: The Seizure of Power movement provided the Cultural Revolution Group with an opportunity to expand its influence and seize a portion of party and government power.

description.zh-cn: 根据1967年的照片，潘复生在夺权后的黑龙江革命委员会中居于中心位置。
description.en: According to a 1967 photograph, Pan Fusheng was the central figure in the Heilongjiang Revolutionary Committee after the seizure of power.

description.zh-cn: 一月风暴事件发生在上海。
description.en: The January Storm event took place in Shanghai.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会
relationships.target: 关于人民解放军坚决支持革命左派群众的决定

description.zh-cn: 中共中央是《关于人民解放军坚决支持革命左派群众的决定》的联合发布方之一。
description.en: The CPC Central Committee was one of the joint issuers of the 'Decision on the People's Liberation Army's Resolute Support for the Revolutionary Leftist Masses'.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 关于人民解放军坚决支持革命左派群众的决定

description.zh-cn: 国务院是《关于人民解放军坚决支持革命左派群众的决定》的联合发布方之一。
description.en: The State Council was one of the joint issuers of the 'Decision on the People's Liberation Army's Resolute Support for the Revolutionary Leftist Masses'.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央军事委员会
relationships.target: 关于人民解放军坚决支持革命左派群众的决定

description.zh-cn: 中央军委是《关于人民解放军坚决支持革命左派群众的决定》的联合发布方之一。
description.en: The Central Military Commission was one of the joint issuers of the 'Decision on the People's Liberation Army's Resolute Support for the Revolutionary Leftist Masses'.

relationships.target: 关于人民解放军坚决支持革命左派群众的决定

description.zh-cn: 中央文革小组是《关于人民解放军坚决支持革命左派群众的决定》的联合发布方之一。
description.en: The Cultural Revolution Group was one of the joint issuers of the 'Decision on the People's Liberation Army's Resolute Support for the Revolutionary Leftist Masses'.

relationships.source: 关于人民解放军坚决支持革命左派群众的决定

description.zh-cn: 该决定命令军队正式介入地方文革，支持革命左派群众。
description.en: This decision ordered the military to formally intervene in the local Cultural Revolution and support the revolutionary leftist masses.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 1967年3月，中央军委发出了关于“三支两军”任务的决定。
description.en: In March 1967, the Central Military Commission issued a decision regarding the 'Three Supports and Two Militaries' tasks.

description.zh-cn: “三支两军”任务以“支左”为中心，即支持地方的“革命左派”（造反派）。
description.en: The 'Three Supports and Two Militaries' tasks were centered on 'supporting the left,' which meant supporting the local 'revolutionary leftists' (rebel factions).

description.zh-cn: 在夺权运动中，林彪集团支持的造反派在各地乘机膨胀。
description.en: During the Seizure of Power movement, the rebel factions supported by the Lin Biao Clique took the opportunity to expand in various places.

description.zh-cn: 在夺权运动中，中央文革小组支持的造反派在各地乘机膨胀。
description.en: During the Seizure of Power movement, the rebel factions supported by the Cultural Revolution Group took the opportunity to expand in various places.
